wikipedia_page.main: Adrian Francis Breacker (born 1934), is a male former athlete who competed for England.

response: Sandstrom won the Gold medal in the 4x100 metres relay, two years later at, the 1958 European Championships in Stockholm, Sweden, alongside Peter Radford, David Segal and Adrian Breacker.
